CustomField.description: Exceeds Expectations - Completed Alg 2/ Trig or advanced Math by the end of Jr year (Pre-Calc, Calc, Stats or any of the AP math courses) Meets Expectations -On track to complete Alg 2 by end of Senior year Does Not Meet Expectations - Not taken or planning to take Alg 2 or in developmental Math, have taken Alg 2 and received a DS or lower.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Exceeds Expectations - Completed Alg 2/ Trig or advanced Math by the end of Jr year (Pre-Calc, Calc, Stats or any of the AP math courses) Meets Expectations -On track to complete Alg 2 by end of Senior year Does Not Meet Expectations - Not taken or planning to take Alg 2 or in developmental Math, have taken Alg 2 and received a DS or lower.
CustomField.label: On Track in Math
